Uses of Package
org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser

  • Packages that use org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser 
    Package Description
    org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser
    Defines the main classes that are you used by the entry browser of the Control Panel.
    org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.datamodel
    Defines the data structures that are used in the control panel.
    org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.task
    Defines the main classes that are you used to perform the administrative operations: start the server, modify an entry, delete a base DN, etc.
    org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.ui
    Contains the panels and dialogs displayed in the Control Panel.
    org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.ui.nodes
    Contains the different nodes that are used in the trees of the Control Panel (index browser, schema browser, LDAP entries browser...).
    org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.util
    Contains some utilities used in the Control Panel.
  • Classes in org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser used by org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser 
    Class and Description
    AbstractNodeTask
    This is an abstract class that is extended to search for nodes or to refresh the contents of the nodes.
    ConnectionWithControls
    Associates a ConnectionWrapper with the LDAP Controls it should use when performing operation.
    IconPool
    This class is used as a cache containing the icons that are used by the BrowserController to update the nodes.
    LDAPConnectionPool
    An LDAPConnectionPool is a pool of LDAPConnection.
    NodeRefresher.State
    The enumeration containing all the states the refresher can have.
  • Classes in org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser used by org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.datamodel 
    Class and Description
    IconPool
    This class is used as a cache containing the icons that are used by the BrowserController to update the nodes.
    LDAPConnectionPool
    An LDAPConnectionPool is a pool of LDAPConnection.
  • Classes in org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser used by org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.task 
    Class and Description
    BrowserController
    This is the main class of the LDAP entry browser.
  • Classes in org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser used by org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.ui 
    Class and Description
    BasicNodeError
    Error record.
    BrowserController
    This is the main class of the LDAP entry browser.
  • Classes in org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser used by org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.ui.nodes 
    Class and Description
    BasicNodeError
    Error record.
  • Classes in org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser used by org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.util 
    Class and Description
    ConnectionWithControls
    Associates a ConnectionWrapper with the LDAP Controls it should use when performing operation.
